All your files have been encrypted
Your computer has been infected with a ransomware virus. Your files have been encrypted and you won't
be able to decrypt them without our help.What can I do to get my files back?You can buy our special
decryption software, this software will allow you to recover all your data and remove
the ransomware from your computer.The price of the software is $200.Mail loc_dic@tutanota.com
